name: Grapple Simulator
description:
Experience what Spiderman may have felt like the FIRST time he ever tried to swing through the city.

You start high atop a skyscraper with grappling hooks attached to each hand.

Try not to die by slamming into a building or falling to the ground. Intentionally designed to be hard as hell. Endless fun once you get the HANG of it.

Set new records for swinging to way points as fast as you can.

Donate to help us develop this into a full game with a working city, pizza delivery challenges, crime fighting and so much more.
